name: Willy on a Wheel
description:
The world has gone into chaos. A zombie apocalypse has broken out and millions are infected.

Willy, a normal and boring old man, somehow got stuck on a giant wheel. Now he has to stabilize on it or he'll fall off and most likely be eaten. And if that wasn't enough, the government is firing missiles at his giant wheel.

Will you be able to survive the apocalypse?!

NOTE - leaderboards are not supported in web version

Credits:

GoldenGold, OwenVanTableMusic & SFX
